price: To, a yau Munã kuɓutar* da kai game da jikinka, dõmin ka kasance ãyã ga waɗanda suke a bãyanka. Kuma lalle ne mãsu yawa daga mutãne, haƙĩƙa, gafalallu ne ga ãyõyinMu.
arabic: فَٱلۡيَوۡمَ نُنَجِّيكَ بِبَدَنِكَ لِتَكُونَ لِمَنۡ خَلۡفَكَ ءَايَةٗۚ وَإِنَّ كَثِيرٗا مِّنَ ٱلنَّاسِ عَنۡ ءَايَٰتِنَا لَغَٰفِلُونَ
footnotes: * Kuɓutar da jikin Fir'auna: Banda rũhinsa dõmin a tabbatar da yã mutu.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fal-yawma nunajjīka bibadanika litakūna liman khalfaka āyatan wa-inna kathīran mina al-nāsi ʿan āyātinā laghāfilūna
